params.prompt: The video shows a man giving a speech in a formal setting, likely a conference or educational event, with a plain green background. He is wearing a light blue button-up shirt, has gray hair, and a matching beard, with a lanyard around his neck that has printed letters and numbers, possibly from an event. He stands behind a wooden podium with a microphone, addressing an audience not visible in the frame. The man uses expressive hand gestures, moving his hands from a clasped position to various open and expressive gestures as he speaks. He continues to gesture and speak, occasionally clasping his hands together and then opening them again, maintaining his movements and speech throughout the video. The camera focuses on him, maintaining attention on the speaker, creating a professional and focused atmosphere.
params.negative_prompt: 色调艳丽，过曝，静态，细节模糊不清，字幕，风格，作品，画作，画面，静止，整体发灰，最差质量，低质量，JPEG压缩残留，丑陋的，残缺的，多余的手指，画得不好的手部，画得不好的脸部，畸形的，毁容的，形态畸形的肢体，手指融合，静止不动的画面，杂乱的背景，三条腿，背景人很多，倒着走
